criteria: Accuracy of labeling North American countries (Canada, USA, Mexico)
Accuracy of labeling oceans surrounding North America (Atlantic, Pacific, Arctic)
Accuracy of labeling the Great Lakes (Superior, Michigan, Huron, Erie, Ontario)
Accuracy of labeling major rivers (Mississippi, Missouri, St. Lawrence)
Accuracy of labeling major mountain ranges (Rocky Mountains, Appalachian Mountains)
Identification of essential map elements (title, legend, directional indicator, scale, date)
